title: GHOST MATCH, RECONECT BUG
body:
I finished a matche 1 hour ago, then i skipped stats cos they werent coming, then i log off..
When i log in, it still appears the reconect buttom.. And the match was finished..
Help me pls

replies.body: A ghost game can occur if the server doesn't pick up that the match has ended.  Sometimes simply relogging can resolve this, otherwise you would have to wait it out.  Hopefully, everything is okay now!
